sentences.en: a deepening international crisis
sentences.cn: 日益加深的国际危机

sentences.en: A good optional course will broaden and deepen students'insights and knowledge.
sentences.cn: 一门好的选修课能扩大并加深学生的视野和知识.

sentences.en: Again, also can deepen understanding to the product in the interpreter.
sentences.cn: 再次, 在翻译中也可以对产品加深了解.

sentences.en: deepening shadows
sentences.cn: 越来越暗的阴影

sentences.en: Did the cheque to Trenor explain the mystery or deepen it?
sentences.cn: 这张付与雷诺的支票解释了这桩疑案抑或加剧了它的神秘色彩?

sentences.en: Enlarge and deepen the opening - up scope of business service.
sentences.cn: 扩大商业服务业开放的广度和深度.

sentences.en: He heard her breathing deepen.
sentences.cn: 他听到她的呼吸变深了。

sentences.en: He is able to deepen and enlarge our compassion and to purify our thanksgiving.
sentences.cn: 他能使我们的同情更深更广,纯化我们的感恩之情.

sentences.en: Her wrinkles deepen with age.
sentences.cn: 她的皱纹随年龄增长而变深.

sentences.en: If this is not stopped, the financial crisis will deepen.
sentences.cn: 如果不对其加以阻止，财政危机将会加剧。

sentences.en: In war - time, as on board ship, relationships deepen fast.
sentences.cn: 在战时, 同在船上一样, 关系加深得很快.

sentences.en: Must hold to for a long time accordingly and deepen ceaselessly.
sentences.cn: 因此必须长期坚持并不断深化.

sentences.en: Surviving tough times can really deepen your relationship.
sentences.cn: 共度患难能够切实地加深你们之间的关系。

sentences.en: The re - exploration of things would help deepen our understanding towards them.
sentences.cn: 对于事物的再认识,有助于我们对它的理解.

sentences.en: The recession continues to deepen.
sentences.cn: 经济衰退继续加剧。

sentences.en: The tender widow's habitual melancholy seemed to deepen into a sadder gloom.
sentences.cn: 这位好心的寡妇一向郁郁寡欢,现在更变得愁容满面,情绪消沉了.

sentences.en: The water deepened gradually.
sentences.cn: 水渐渐变深了。

sentences.en: Their friendship soon deepened into love.
sentences.cn: 他们的友谊很快发展成为爱情。

sentences.en: This spice is used particularly in poultry feed to deepen the colour of egg yolks.
sentences.cn: 这种香料尤用于家禽的饲料中，以加深蛋黄的颜色。

sentences.en: We'll have to deepen the well if we want more water.
sentences.cn: 如果我们想要更多的水,就得把井加深.

words.tran_cn: 使深化；加深（deepen的现在分词）

trans.tran_en: if a serious situation deepens, it gets worse – used especially in news reports
if a serious situation deepens, it gets worse – used especially in news reports
if a serious situation deepens, it gets worse – used especially in news reports
